### Gitian build:

8b1865ec89b25183c6fb7a7b4bdaf5c35d064
Concept ACK\n\nDependencies are part of the attack surface in some sense, and attack surface reduction is good by definition :)

> Only obvious difference I could see in the build is skipping a configure check.\n\nThis is because `CoreWLan` is only used by the bearer plugin, which we [already disable](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/packages/qt.mk#L75). So no compilation saved, just skipping a configure check.
